title: Permabann
body:
This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details.

I don´t know why I got a permabann?

I checked my email address already but I got no mail from Riot, so iI have no details

replies.body:
This is the german board. 

To get more infos about the ban, send a ticket to the Support. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de
